00268 inline bool CLine2d::operator == (const CLine2d& line) const
00269 {
00270        return ((m_point1 == line.m_point1) && (m_point2 == line.m_point2));
00271 }
00272 
00273 
00274 inline bool CLine2d::operator != (const CLine2d& line) const
00275 {
00276        return !operator == (line);
00277 }

00280 inline bool CLine2d::IsNull() const
00281 {
00282        return (m_point1 == m_point2);
00283 }

00286 inline CVector2d CLine2d::GetDiffVector() const
00287 {
00288        return m_point2 - m_point1;
00289 }

00316 inline double CLine2d::GetCutXPos(double linePosY) const
00317 {
00318        CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
00319 
00320        return (linePosY - m_point1.GetY()) * diff.GetX() / diff.GetY() + m_point1.GetX();
00321 }
00322 
00323 
00324 
00325 inline double CLine2d::GetCutYPos(double linePosX) const
00326 {
00327        CVector2d diff = GetDiffVector();
00328 
00329        return (linePosX - m_point1.GetX()) * diff.GetY() / diff.GetX() + m_point1.GetY();
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 inline double CLine2d::GetCutAlpha(const CLine2d& line) const
00334 {
00335        const i2d::CVector2d& delta = GetDiffVector();
00336        const i2d::CVector2d& lineDelta = line.GetDiffVector();
00337        const i2d::CVector2d& beginPoint = GetPoint1();
00338        const i2d::CVector2d& lineBeginPoint = line.GetPoint1();
00339 
00340        double crossProductZ = lineDelta.GetCrossProductZ(delta);
00341 
00342        return (beginPoint.GetCrossProductZ(delta) + delta.GetCrossProductZ(lineBeginPoint)) / crossProductZ;
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00346 inline double CLine2d::GetCastAlpha(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
00347 {
00348        i2d::CVector2d delta = GetDiffVector();
00349        i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
00350 
00351        double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
00352        return dotProduct / delta.GetLength2();
00353 }
00354 
00355 
00356 inline bool CLine2d::CutDisk(const i2d::CVector2d& center, double radius) const
00357 {
00358        const i2d::CVector2d& delta = GetDiffVector();
00359        const i2d::CVector2d& deltaToCenter = m_point1 - center;
00360 
00361        double a = delta.GetLength2();
00362        if (a < I_BIG_EPSILON * I_BIG_EPSILON){
00363               return (m_point1.GetDistance2(center) <= radius * radius);
00364        }
00365        double b = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToCenter);
00366        double c = deltaToCenter.GetLength2() - radius * radius;
00367 
00368        double D = b * b - a * c;
00369        if (D >= 0){
00370               double sqrtD = ::sqrt(D);
00371 
00372               double alpha1 = (-b - sqrtD) / a;
00373               double alpha2 = (-b + sqrtD) / a;
00374               if ((alpha1 < 1) && (alpha2 > 0)){
00375                      return true;
00376               }
00377        }
00378        return false;
00379 }
00380 
00381 
00382 inline QPair<double, double> CLine2d::GetAlphaAndCastDistance(const i2d::CVector2d& point) const
00383 {
00384        i2d::CVector2d delta = m_point2 - m_point1;
00385        i2d::CVector2d deltaToPoint = point - m_point1;
00386 
00387        double dotProduct = delta.GetDotProduct(deltaToPoint);
00388        double field = delta.GetCrossProductZ(deltaToPoint);
00389        double deltaLength2 = delta.GetLength2();
00390 
00391        return QPair<double, double>(dotProduct / deltaLength2, field / ::sqrt(deltaLength2));
00392 }
